properties.name: velocity.properties-config-location
properties.description: Optional: a different resource location for velocity internal properties. (http://velocity.apache.org/engine/2.0/configuration.html)

properties.name: velocity.properties
properties.description: Optional: option to manage velocity internal properties via spring application properties. (http://velocity.apache.org/engine/2.0/configuration.html)

properties.name: velocity.override-config-location-properties
properties.description: If true, the properties from spring application will override the esisting quartz properties from velocity.propertiesConfigLocation
